message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $12,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. It's a fair price considering its value to me.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $9,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product for $11,000. It's a fair compromise considering its value to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. However, $11,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,500. This price reflects the value of the product to me, and I hope we can reach an agreement.

I understand that $10,500 is still a bit above your target price, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product for $11,200. This is as low as I can go, considering the product's value to me.
